_header: When doctors preached to win the joy eternal
Note:
See Bawcutt (1967)
XBawcutt, Priscilla J. The Shorter Poems of Gavin Douglas.
Scottish Text Society 4th ser. 3. Edinburgh and London, 1967, pp. liii-liv, 137, 215. Cf. 6319.
Subjects: salvation, preaching to win; consience; advice, to princes
_description: On conscience, advice to the King — three 8-line stanzas, ababbcbc

Banna.First Lines:
Quhen doctouris prechit to win the ioy eternallVnto the hevin eftir
                    out lordis assense…
Banna.Last Lines:
…ffor corruptioun befoir thy deyis hes beneAganis Iustice with
                    vþir grit offens
Banna.Facsimiles:
Fox,  Denton,  and  William A. Ringler.  
             The Bannatyne Manuscript: National Library of Scotland Advocates’
                MS. 1.1.6
         London: Scolar Press, in Association with The National Library of
            Scotland, 1980.
